We have used Cox Pool Service for over 10 years and they have been so helpful. If something is wrong, I usually contact them and they are quick to attend to the problem. At one time, lighting fried our pump and electrical pad and George … More

Always look at reviews and the responses from the company. They paint a good picture of what you’re about to deal with. I wish I would have done that. Lesson learned. I will never use this company again. And yes Dawn knows I am a customer. … More Response from the owner a year ago We have no customer by this name!  Please disregard.
